text: O vy shcho vvazhayete, ne ubyvayete budʹ-yaku hru protyahom pilgrimage. Budʹ khto khto ubyvaye budʹ-yaku hru na meti, yoho shtraf bude dekilʹka tvaryn domashnoyi khudoby tse - ekvivalent do tvaryn hry vin zbytyy. Vyrok povynen buty vstanovlenyy dvoma rivnopravnymy lyudʹmy sered vas. Vony budutʹ perekonatysya shcho proponuvannya prostyahayutʹsya Ka`bah. Inakshe, vin mozhe expiate hoduyuchy bidnykh lyudey, abo ekvivalentom shvydkym pokutuvaty yoho zlochyn. BOH probachyv mynuli zlochyny. Ale yakshcho budʹ khto prybutky do takoho zlochynu, BOH bude avenge tse. BOH ye Mohutniy, Avenger
